author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Debugged the material budget part and in course of that re-arranged the code between src and plugin area

#### PR validation:

Tested the code by running for material budget and got acceptable results

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Need to be added to master. No back porting is required
title: Run2-TB34 Update some of the code for material budget calculation and re-arrange
